<h1>Riot Manifesto Stories</h1>

		<div class="share-bar">
			<a href="/taxonomy/term/98/feed" class="rss-link">RSS</a>			<span class='st_twitter_custom st_ico' displayText='Tweet'></span>

<div class="ds-1col taxonomy-term vocabulary-topic view-mode-full clearfix ">



  
  <div class="taxonomy-term-description"> <p>Stories that exemplify one or more of our core values from the <a href="/about">Riot Manifesto</a>.</p>
 </div></div></div>

  <div id="zone-footer" class="zone zone-footer clearfix container-12">
    <div class="grid-12 region region-footer-first" id="region-footer-first">
  <div class="region-inner region-footer-first-inner">
    <section class="block block-menu block-menu-footer-menu-1 block-menu-menu-footer-menu-1 odd" id="block-menu-menu-footer-menu-1">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
              <h2 class="block-title">Company</h2>

      <section id="section-content" class="section section-content">
  <div id="zone-content-wrapper" class="zone-wrapper zone-content-wrapper clearfix">  
  <div id="zone-content" class="zone zone-content clearfix container-12">    
    
      
    
    <div class="grid-12 region region-content region-content-manifesto" id="region-content">
  <div class="region-inner region-content-inner">
    <a id="main-content"></a>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      <div class="ds-1col node node-manifesto view-mode-full clearfix ">
		
	<!--
THIS FILE IS NOT USED AND IS HERE AS A STARTING POINT FOR CUSTOMIZATION ONLY.
See http://api.drupal.org/api/function/theme_field/7 for details.
After copying this file to your theme's folder and customizing it, remove this
HTML comment.
-->
<div class="timeline-slider field field-name-field-timeline-items field-type-node-reference field-label-hidden">
<ul class="slides field-items">
<li class="slide field-item even"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>Riot Games</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>We aspire to be the most player-focused game company in the world. We were established in 2006 by a couple of entrepreneurial gamers who believe player-focused game development can result in awesome games. In 2009, we released our debut title, <em>League of Legends</em>, to critical and player acclaim. Over 100 million play every month.</p>
<p>We know players form the foundation of our community and it&rsquo;s for them that we continue to evolve and improve the <em>League of Legends</em> experience.</p>
 </div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/PC%20BANG%202_0.jpg?itok=6yDAkwb8" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item odd"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>March 2015</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>Riot debuts at #13 on&nbsp;<em>Fortune</em>&#39;s 100 Best Companies to Work for list.&nbsp;This award is based on internal culture stories and surveys of Rioters, so this recognition most importantly means that Rioters believe Riot&rsquo;s a great place to work. In June 2015, we also place on #21 on <em>Fortune&#39;s</em> 100 Best Workplaces for Millennials.&nbsp;For us, a great place to work is somewhere Rioters &ndash; passionate, smart, player-focused professionals &ndash; will thrive, a place they can take on impactful projects and solve tricky problems all to create value for players.</p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150309/1656/riot-lands-13-fortune%E2%80%99s-100-best-companies-work-list" target="_blank" class="cta-link">Read more</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/fortune_slider_0.png?itok=FqnPuoAp" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item even"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>December 2014</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-3cd4d0b3-5ab7-5ffc-6389-732449b8647d">Merch where?! Merch here. Like a majestic manatee strapped to the hood of a mega-rocket, we launched the public beta of Riot Games Merch - a one-stop (digital) shop for </span><em>League </em>art, clothing, and collectibles. Oh yeah, also demon bears; we can&#39;t forget that one. The wrinkles that sometimes crop up with beta launches are still being ironed out, but we&rsquo;re stoked to finally give players a physical piece of the <em>League </em>universe for their homes, offices, yurts, and submarines (there&rsquo;s a Nautilus joke here, but we&rsquo;ll spare you).&nbsp;</p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/merch-beta" target="_blank" class="cta-link">Read more</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/jinx_test%20%282%29.png?itok=Hn8gzmK8" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item odd"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>October 2014</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-3cd4d0b3-5ada-9ea6-b9ff-1ea79d222341">Korean powerhouse Samsung White held the Summoner&rsquo;s Cup high after claiming victory over Royal Club in the Season 4 World Championships held at Seoul&rsquo;s Sangam Stadium. Across all international stages of the competition, we saw 288 million cumulative daily unique impressions totaling up to over 179 million hours of esports viewed across the world. That&rsquo;s a whole lotta pizza delivered.</span></p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20141201/1628/worlds-2014-numbers" target="_blank" class="cta-link">Read more</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/october2014.jpg?itok=Dn6rF9O8" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item even"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>January 2014</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-3cd4d0b3-5add-ee18-5d42-9eb2f79972c1">As of January 2014, over 67 million players slug it out in </span><em>League </em>every month, and more than 7.5 million people play during peak hours. This, of course, makes for a pretty bummed out Baron Nashor (to be fair, he kinda deserves it).&nbsp;</p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20140711/1322/league-players-reach-new-heights-2014" class="cta-link">Read more</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/January2014.jpg?itok=jKocQRr-" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item odd"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>December 2013</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>We hit the launch button on the Riot Games API Beta, and we&rsquo;re ready for you to start tinkering with it. We&rsquo;re psyched to share the API that the community&#39;s been craving, and we&rsquo;re even more excited to see what kind of kickass tools and apps they&rsquo;ll build.</p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20131210/1062/riot-games-api-launches-beta" class="cta-link">Start Tinkering</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/APIHeaderNew.jpg?itok=615-4T9n" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item even"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>July 2013</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>In their last physical issue, the editors of Game Developer Magazine included Riot in their &quot;Top 30 Game Developers of All Time&quot; listicle. As a young company still earning our stripes, we don&#39;t feel totally worthy of a list that includes developers of games we grew up playing. We still kinda feel like we&#39;re standing on the shoulders of giants. Or yetis.&nbsp;</p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20130710/839/riot-named-one-top-30-developers-all-time" class="cta-link">Read More</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/GDmaglogo.jpg?itok=0ANC183S" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item odd"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>July 2013</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>Rioter feedback places Riot Games in the #4 spot among Glassdoor.com&rsquo;s &ldquo;25 Best Tech Companies to Work for in 2013.&rdquo;&nbsp;</p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20130712/847/positive-feedback-earns-riot-4-spot-%E2%80%9C25-best-tech-companies-work-2013%E2%80%9D" target="_blank" class="cta-link">Read More</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/RiotSTL_Office_0057-SELECT-2_0.jpg?itok=auv6LQEt" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item even"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>March 2013</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p><em>League of Legends</em> hit a new milestone, now regularly exceeding five million peak concurrent players globally. That&rsquo;s a few more than we reported back in October. We&#39;re humbled by the support of players and now more than ever feel the weight of those expectations. Good luck, have fun, and please have mercy on our servers.&nbsp;</p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20130312/700/league-legends-players-summit-new-peak" class="cta-link">Player Summit a New Peak</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/5millheader2.jpg?itok=60r01SUj" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item odd"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>January 2013</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>Edge Magazine&rsquo;s released their 2013 Edge Developer Awards, and Riot Games features in the top ten countdown. The list is made up of &ldquo;the best development studios on the planet today,&rdquo; based on companies that are &ldquo;creating enthralling experiences with finite development resources,&rdquo; and &ldquo;understand and engage with their audiences, and have the vision to know where games are going next.&rdquo; Riot was called out specifically for promoting &ldquo;balanced design, constant updates and community involvement.&rdquo;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20130215/667/riot-games-named-top-10-developer-edge-developer-awards" class="cta-link">Learn More</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/EdgeHeader2_0.jpg?itok=RQ0NZ9Ci" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item even"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>December 2012</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>The flurry of end-of-year listicles has begun. Usually, journalists put companies on such lists thanks to what they have done, but in this case, Riot&#39;s co-founders &quot;deserve recognition for what they haven&#39;t done,&quot; according to GamesIndustry International. What haven&#39;t we done, and why&#39;s that listicle-worthy?&nbsp;</p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20130509/574/co-founders-named-top-10-persons-year" target="_blank" class="cta-link">Read more</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/gamesindustheader.jpg?itok=i2bW2eyu" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item odd"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>December 2012</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>Welcome to the new riotgames.com. This site will give you a peak behind the scenes, show you what we&rsquo;re up to, and tell the Riot tales.&nbsp;</p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20130509/581/welcome-new-riotgamescom" target="_blank" class="cta-link">See what's new</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/Rgwebsitephoto.jpg?itok=sthzAKhn" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item even"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>October 2012</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>Rioters are gamers. We love games. As we strive to create the best player experiences, it&rsquo;s important that we understand play beyond the Fields of Justice. This means that we play games &ndash; and not just our own. The new Riot Play Fund encourages plentiful play by giving each Rioter $300 to spend freely on any video game, whether MOBA, FPS, console or PC. We&#39;re equal opportunity players here.</p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20121029/531/funding-riots-play" class="cta-link">Take play seriously</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/PC_Cafe1.jpg?itok=QbTeEHjt" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item odd"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>October 2012</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p><em>League of Legends </em>has in the last year tripled in size to 32 million monthly active &ndash; and we do mean active &ndash; players, making it the most played game in the Orion Spur of the Milky Way galaxy, by total hours played per month. That&#39;s good news for us and bad news for Teemo! Recent stats show that player-on-yordle violence has increased dramatically over the past year.</p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20121015/138/league-legends-growth-spells-bad-news-teemo" target="_blank" class="cta-link">Teemo probably deserves it</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/Timeline_0.jpg?itok=BI1QWtKH" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item even"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>October 2012</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>The popular Tribunal system brings <em>League of Legends </em>players who step out of line before a jury of their peers. With the October launch of Honor, we&#39;re bringing some carrot. Honor provides players a way to give each other virtual fist-bumps for excellent sportsmanship and teamwork. Badges for collaborative play? Sign us up.</p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/articles/20121116/245/honor-helps-sanitize-bad-behavior" target="_blank" class="cta-link">DEJERKIFY ONLINE GAMES THE RIOT WAY</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/Honor_0.jpg?itok=xrAFV2me" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item odd"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>October 2012</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>Taiwanese underdogs Taipei Assassins slay the field and capture the title of <em>League of Legends</em> Season 2 World Champions. Over 8 million viewers tune in to watch TPA win the tournament&#39;s cash prize of $1,000,000. How&#39;d they do it?</p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/articles/20150519/549/league-legends-season-two-championship" target="_blank" class="cta-link">Awesome teamwork is how</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/WC-TPA-Timeline.jpg?itok=PqrpnyjU" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item even"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>July 2012</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>How do you get a new member of the team up to speed? Some companies call it onboarding or orientation. We introduce our new team members to Riot via a multi-week immersion program that starts on day one with a playtest.</p>
<p>We call it Denewbification.</p>
 </div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/Denewbification-Timeline.jpg?itok=t4Vn9Ks8" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item odd"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>May 2012</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>Last year, we all took a cruise to Mexico. This year, we gather for the annual offsite in Las Vegas as &quot;Mundo Healthcare&quot; for a weekend of fun, games and some serious stuff, too. But there was one thing that happened in Vegas that won&#39;t stay in Vegas, and that&#39;s the Champions Cup. Engraved with the names of Rioters who do great deeds, the trophy travels to wherever there&#39;s an act of meritorious riotousness to commemorate.</p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/articles/20140910/536/champions-cup-awarded-acts-meritorious-riotousness" target="_blank" class="cta-link">Read more</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/ChampionsCup-Timeline.jpg?itok=4I0cPUJg" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item even"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>October 2011</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>Growing steadily since launch, <em>League of Legends</em> now hosts nearly 12 million players every month, 4 million of whom play daily. Teemo &ndash; that infamous Yordle players just wanna hug to death &ndash; dies 1,389 times a minute.</p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/articles/20140910/508/115-million-playing-lol-each-month" target="_blank" class="cta-link">Catch the 2011 numbers here</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/Teemo_Timeline_1.jpg?itok=mPZbxhEe" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item odd"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>June 2011</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>Over 200,000 viewers FnaticMSI triumph 2-1 over formidable French foes to become the first-ever world champions for <em>League of Legends</em>. Team MVP Shushei claims he&#39;s gonna buy a guitar and drum set with his winnings.</p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/articles/20110622/144/season-one-finale-viewership" target="_blank" class="cta-link">Read more</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/timeline_fnatic.jpg?itok=1JmwmIQJ" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item even"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>February 2011</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>Riot says &ldquo;Ni hao&rdquo; to a new partnership with Tencent. Soon, players throughout China will be saying the same thing to <em>League of Legends</em>, thanks to Tencent&#39;s operating muscle.&nbsp;</p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/articles/20110204/147/tencent-acquires-majority-stake-riot-games" target="_blank" class="cta-link">Want details?</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/ryzekat_timeline.jpg?itok=kLrtoVy0" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>
<li class="slide field-item odd"><div class="ds-1col node node-timeline-item view-mode-full clearfix ">

  
  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>October 2010</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>League of Legends wins five GDC Online awards: Best Online Game Design, Best Visual Arts, Best Online Technology, Best New Online Game, and the Audience Award. Riot&#39;s crew has to check luggage on the way home from Austin.</p>
 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/articles/20101012/150/league-legends-leads-2010-gdc-online-award-winners" target="_blank" class="cta-link">Read more</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/GDCO_2010-Timeline_0.jpg?itok=1WLZ3Jft" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>

 </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-cta-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/articles/20091007/260/league-legends-here" target="_blank" class="cta-link">Ancient press release here</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/timeline_keyart1.jpg?itok=25NRmtCr" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>

  <div class="field-group-format group_meta field-group-div group-meta timeline-meta speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>September 2006</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>Two life-long hardcore online gamers, Brandon Beck and Marc Merrill, ditch life in the corporate world to start Riot Games.&nbsp;</p>
 </div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-timeline-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/timeline_image/public/content/timeline/image/Timeline-FiddlesticksConcept_0.png?itok=O4TGQV3Q" width="1000" height="494" alt="" /></div></div></div></div></li>

</div><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h1>The Riot Manifesto</h1></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-manifesto-items field-type-node-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="ds-1col  clearfix ">

    <div class="field-name-title">
  	<h2 class="manifesto-title">Player Experience First</h2>
  </div>
  <div class="group_accordian field-group-div group-accordian manifesto-container">
  	<div class="view-pane">
  		<div class="manifesto-text">
  			<div class="field-name-body">
  				 <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-06ef2bba-e42c-84c2-ca50-fed9c00ee6d9">We obsess over every part of the experience, from a player&rsquo;s first game to their thousandth win, from installation to support to esports broadcasts. It all matters. </span></p>
<p><span>We listen to what players say and do. We analyze. Then we make data-informed decisions to improve the experience.&nbsp;</span></p>
   			</div>
  		</div>

    <div class="field-name-title">
  	<h2 class="manifesto-title">Challenge Convention</h2>
  </div>
  <div class="group_accordian field-group-div group-accordian manifesto-container">
  	<div class="view-pane">
  		<div class="manifesto-text">
  			<div class="field-name-body">
  				 <p>Impossible&rsquo;s our favorite kind of possible.</p>
<p>Doing the right thing often requires disregarding the rules and upending the status quo.</p>

    <div class="field-name-title">
  	<h2 class="manifesto-title">Focus on Talent and Team</h2>
  </div>
  <div class="group_accordian field-group-div group-accordian manifesto-container">
  	<div class="view-pane">
  		<div class="manifesto-text">
  			<div class="field-name-body">
  				 <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-06ef2bba-e42f-0c28-3d59-9d7c85a428bd">We attract, develop, and cultivate entrepreneurial teams who prefer action over process and bureaucracy. </span></p>
<p><span>We&rsquo;re a sports team, not a family. </span></p>
<p><span>As a meritocracy, we value results delivered.</span></p>
   			</div>
  		</div>
  		<div class="news-items tray-config-three">
  			<div class="ds-1col node node-article view-mode-landscape_teaser clearfix ">

    <div class="field-name-title">
  	<h2 class="manifesto-title">Take Play Seriously</h2>
  </div>
  <div class="group_accordian field-group-div group-accordian manifesto-container">
  	<div class="view-pane">
  		<div class="manifesto-text">
  			<div class="field-name-body">
  				 <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-06ef2bba-e430-a9bf-a483-af73b802acfd">It&rsquo;s never just a game. </span></p>
<p><span>We play lots of games and proudly call ourselves gamers. Even at work, we make time for daily play and fun. </span></p>
<p><span>We&rsquo;re professionals, but don&rsquo;t take ourselves too seriously.&nbsp;</span></p>
   			</div>
  		</div>
  		<div class="news-items tray-config-one">
  			<div class="ds-1col node node-article view-mode-landscape_teaser clearfix ">

  </div></div><div class="field-item even"><div class="ds-1col  clearfix ">

    <div class="field-name-title">
  	<h2 class="manifesto-title">Stay Hungry, Stay Humble</h2>
  </div>
  <div class="group_accordian field-group-div group-accordian manifesto-container">
  	<div class="view-pane">
  		<div class="manifesto-text">
  			<div class="field-name-body">
  				 <p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-06ef2bba-e431-f551-d985-a2556a3a5d3d">We strive to be humbitious &ndash; ambitious and humble. </span></p>
<p dir="ltr"><span>Complacency kills innovation, but ambition kills complacency. </span></p>
<p dir="ltr"><span>We humbly seek and accept feedback. </span></p>
<p dir="ltr"><span>We credit the larger team: the families, teammates and players who make it all possible. </span></p>
<p dir="ltr"><span>And we believe there&rsquo;s always more we can do for players.</span></p>
   			</div>
  		</div>
  		<div class="news-items tray-config-one">
  			<div class="ds-1col node node-article view-mode-landscape_teaser clearfix ">

</div><section class="block block-views block-where-we-play-block block-views-where-we-play-block even" id="block-views-where-we-play-block">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
              <h2 class="block-title">Where We Play</h2>
            
    <div class="content clearfix">
      <div class="view view-where-we-play view-id-where_we_play view-display-id-block where-play view-dom-id-9aebabc56d5aabd690e0d32d039af98e">
            <div class="view-header">
       <p>Riot Games’ HQ is based in sunny Los Angeles, California, 
but we’ve got 19 offices across the globe. Our international teams ensure that player experiences aren’t lost in translation - no matter where your desk sits, you’re still a Rioter.</p>      </div>

            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-e842fbb0-14b8-4211-b47f-cb6c1bb99c18');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();

                                    32º
                                </span><span class="g1-card-tempo__temperatura-sufixo">MÁX</span></div></div><div class="column small-7 end"><div class="g1-card-tempo__temperatura-previsao"><span class="js-card-tempo-temperatura-min">

                        Sol e aumento de nuvens de manhã. Pancadas de chuva à tarde e à noite.

                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
    });

})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 25/03/2017 19:52:21 --></html>

<script id="articles-template" type="text/x-handlebars-template">
          {{#each articles}}            

            <li id="nativeads_position_{{@index}}" class="{{#not_empty cover_image_url}}nwl-has-img{{/not_empty}} nwl-row {{#if showDate}}new-date{{/if}}">     

              {{#if showDate}}
                <h6 class="nwl-date"> {{dateFormat first_published_at}} </h6>
              {{/if}}
              <div class="clearfix"></div>
              <div class="wrap-li">
                <span class="nwl-news-time">{{timeFormat first_published_at}}</span>

                {{#not_empty cover_image_url}}
                <span data-href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" class="nwl-wpr-cover box">
                  <div class="r7-shareit-holder">                      
                      <div class="image-holder" style="position: relative">
                      <img alt="" class="article-video-icon-tag" style="{{#not_empty is_video}}display: block{{/not_empty}}" src="data:image/png;base64," />

                        <a href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" data-social-headline="{{section_name}}"  data-social-lead="{{treatment_title title}}" data-shorten="{{url}}" target="{{is_r7_domain url}}">
                            <img class="nwl-cover-reference" src="{{treatment_image cover_image_url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" width="180" height="95" />
                        </a>
                            <div class="r7-shareit-bar no-text">
        <ul class="r7-shareit small">
          <li data-social-type="facebook" title="Compartilhe no Facebook" class="r7-icons r7-facebook shareit"></li>

        </ul>
    </div>

                      </div>                      
                  </div>
                </span>
                {{/not_empty}}

                <div class="nwl-info">
                  <div class="r7-shareit-holder">
                    <p class="nwl-news-title">
                      <a href="{{section_url}}" class="nwl-section nw-link bullet content_scheme" target="{{is_r7_domain section_url}}">{{section_name}}</a>
                    </p>
                    <p class="nwl-news-title link-holder">
                      <a data-social-headline="{{section_name}}"  data-social-lead="{{treatment_title title}}" data-shorten="{{url}}" href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" class="nwl-link" target="{{is_r7_domain url}}">
                        {{treatment_title title}}
                      </a>
                      <img class="hidden" src="{{cover_image_url}}" />

                    <div class="r7-social-media-bar">
                      <ul class="r7-social-media mini" data-shorten="{{url}}" data-image="{{cover_image_url}}" data-lead="{{treatment_title title}}" data-headline="{{section_name}}">

    <h2 class="node-title"><a href="/articles/20121015/241/forbes-profiles-riot-passion" title="Forbes profiles Riot passion">Forbes profiles Riot passion</a></h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="Forbes profiles Riot passion" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>We opened the doors to our Santa Monica digs for press from around the world in the days leading up to the <a href="/articles/20121017/549/league-legends-season-two-championship" target="_blank"><em>League of Legends </em>Season Two World Championship</a> in Los...</p></div></div></div>  </div>

<article about="/articles/20140910/242/neighbors-baffled-stl-lobby" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-teaser node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky self-posted author- even clearfix" id="node-article-242">
        <header>
    <h2 class="node-title"><a href="/articles/20140910/242/neighbors-baffled-stl-lobby" title="Neighbors baffled by STL lobby">Neighbors baffled by STL lobby</a></h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="Neighbors baffled by STL lobby" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>On the 10th floor of a certain office building in a certain city in a certain state in Midwestern America, there’s a certain elevator lobby that seems to spark an awful lot...</p></div></div></div>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">

            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-e41c31f5-f01b-4ad5-9ffa-221041afc904');

                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();

                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
    });

})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 25/03/2017 20:10:21 --></html>

    <div class="grid-9 region region-content region-content-article" id="region-content">

    <a id="main-content"></a>
            		<h1 class="title" id="page-title">Riot Games Santiago</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      


<article about="/articles/20150519/1670/riot-games-santiago" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-sdowney odd clearfix" id="node-article-1670">
        <span property="dc:title" content="Riot Games Santiago" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>	  
    
    <div class="post-date">Posted on 04-14-15</div>		
		<div class="share-bar">
			<a class="print_ico" href="/print/articles/20150519/1670/riot-games-santiago">Print</a>
			<!-- <a class="pdf_ico" href="/printpdf/articles/20150519/1670/riot-games-santiago">PDF</a> -->
			<span class='st_email_custom st_ico' displayText='Email'></span>
			<span class='st_twitter_custom st_ico' displayText='Tweet'></span>
			<span class='st_facebook_custom st_ico' displayText='Facebook'></span>
			<span class='st_linkedin_custom st_ico' displayText='LinkedIn'></span>
			<span class='st_google_custom st_ico' displayText='Google'></span>
			<script type="text/javascript">var switchTo5x=true;</script>
			<script type="text/javascript" src="http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js"></script>
			<script type="text/javascript">
				stLight.options({
		        publisher: 'f65a6e51-8a93-4acd-a665-976809c16a17',
		        onhover: false
		    });</script>
		</div>

    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-526c4dec-bea2-5b04-eddf-65a9d0260f1a">Riot&rsquo;s launching an office in Santiago, and we&rsquo;re on the hunt for new Rioters to help us bring&nbsp;</span><em>League of Legends</em>&nbsp;to LATAM players. With teams in Esports, Community, Publishing, Player Support, and Events to start, we&rsquo;ll continue to grow Riot Santiago as we boost player experiences in LATAM South. How&rsquo;re we gonna make this happen? We&rsquo;re glad you asked.</p>
<ul>
	<li>
		<span id="docs-internal-guid-526c4dec-bea2-5b04-eddf-65a9d0260f1a">Step one: Set up a new office in Santiago with all the support needed for Rioters to work at their best.</span></li>
	<li>
		<span id="docs-internal-guid-526c4dec-bea2-5b04-eddf-65a9d0260f1a">Step two: Continue to monitor and improve live issues to ensure LATAM players are hitting Summoner&rsquo;s Rift without a hitch.</span></li>
	<li>
		<span id="docs-internal-guid-526c4dec-bea2-5b04-eddf-65a9d0260f1a">Step three: Set up local support teams, while making sure</span><em>&nbsp;League of Legends</em>&nbsp;is running healthier than a Thoroughbred with a really great healthcare plan.</li>
	<li>
		<span id="docs-internal-guid-526c4dec-bea2-5b04-eddf-65a9d0260f1a">Step four: Open a broadcast studio to help build out the pro and amateur esports scenes.</span></li>
	<li>
		<span id="docs-internal-guid-526c4dec-bea2-5b04-eddf-65a9d0260f1a">Step five: Take a breather and soak up Santiago&rsquo;s collection of landmarks, regional wines, ski resorts, festivals, and tasty local eats.</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="rtecenter" dir="ltr"><a class="intern-btn" href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers/?offices=1957&amp;depts=" target="_blank">Check out Open Jobs</a></p>
 </div></div></div>
        
    <span class="print-link"></span><div class="field-group-format group_tags field-group-div group-tags clearfix speed-none effect-none"><h3><span>Tags:</span></h3><div class="field field-name-field-topic field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/categories/category" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Working @ Riot Games</a></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-tags field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/tags/riot-games-santiago" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Riot Games Santiago</a></div><div class="field-item odd"><a href="/tags/chile" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Chile</a></div></div></div></div>  </div>

    <div><div class="panel-pane pane-node careers-landing-header" >
  
      
  
  <div class="pane-content">
    <div class="ds-1col exp-layout-text-related node node-explore-banner view-mode-full clearfix ">
    <div class="field-group-format group_scroll_group field-group-div group-scroll-group scroll-pane-explore speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field-group-format group_explore_meta field-group-div group-explore-meta  speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>Rioters Wanted</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>We&rsquo;re looking for humble but ambitious, razor-sharp professionals who can teach us a thing or two. We promise to return the favor. These individuals will become part of entrepreneurial teams who prefer action (kicking ass) over process and bureaucracy (taking names). We embrace those who see things differently, who <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A43u58HQ-A8&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">aren&#39;t afraid to experiment</a>, and who have a healthy disregard for the rules.</p>
<p>Applicants should first learn about Riot and play <em>League of Legends </em>because we&#39;re looking for people who, like us, take play seriously and for whom it&#39;s never &quot;just a game.&quot; We play lots of games, especially our own, because hands-on gaming experience is our ultimate guiding compass.</p>
<p>We&#39;re hiring for multiple levels, from associate to lead, so don&#39;t get hung up on the title; it&#39;s all about the team. For the roles below that are listed by team name, we&#39;re hiring for varying levels of XP.</p>
 </div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-explore-related-articles field-type-node-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">

<article about="/articles/20130509/574/co-founders-named-top-10-persons-year" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-teaser node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-jing even clearfix" id="node-article-574">

s.abort();c(y,function(n,t){e[n]||(e[n]=t)}),f("mark",["onload",a()+h.offset],null,"api");var t=d.createElement("script");t.src="https://"+e.agent,n.parentNode.insertBefore(t,n)}}function o(){"complete"===d.readyState&&i()}function i(){f("mark",["domContent",a()+h.offset],null,"api")}function a(){return E.exists&&performance.now?Math.round(performance.now()):(u=Math.max((new Date).getTime(),u))-h.offset}var u=(new v=""+location,y={beacon:"bam.nr-data.net",errorBeacon:"bam.nr-data.net",agent:"js-agent.newrelic.com/nr-1026.min.js"},b=w&&g&&g[l]&&!/CriOS/.test(navigator.userAgent),h=n.exports={offset:u,now:a,origin:v,features:{},xhrWrappable:b};e(1),d[l]?(d[l]("DOMContentLoaded",i,!1),p[l]("load",r,!1)):(d[m]("onreadystatechange",o),p[m]("onload",r)),f("mark",["firstbyte",u],null,"api");var       <section id="section-content" class="section section-content">
  <div id="zone-content-wrapper" class="zone-wrapper zone-content-wrapper clearfix">  
  <div id="zone-content" class="zone zone-content clearfix container-12">    
    
      
    
    <div class="grid-12 region region-content" id="region-content">
  <div class="region-inner region-content-inner">
    <a id="main-content"></a>
            		<h1 class="title" id="page-title">Contact</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      <div class="view view-faq view-id-faq view-display-id-page faq-page view-dom-id-1dee7e5a23ce8f4e74160b4e3a080f8f">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
      <div class="item-list">      <h3>Company</h3>
    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Interested in working at Riot Games? " rel="faq-a-72" class="faq-question">Interested in working at Riot Games? </a>
<div id="faq-a-72" class="faq-answer"> <p>Visit our&nbsp;<a href="careers" target="_blank">Careers</a>&nbsp;section, which&nbsp;includes information about what it&#39;s like to be a Rioter, how to apply for roles and what sorts of opportunities are available. If you&#39;re looking for career advice,&nbsp;try hitting up our <a href="http://www.linkedin.com/groups/Inside-Riot-Games-People-Game-3544410?gid=3544410">LinkedIn group</a>. LinkedIn is a site for professionally focused discussion and some seekers have received good advice when they ask for help there. Please do try some internet searches first, though. There&#39;s lots of great advice already published online about how to break into the games industry, and there are a number of online resources that will put you on the right path. We hire self-starters, so that means doing some good ol&#39; fashioned Googling before you hit us up with questions.</p>
 </div>  </li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even views-row-last faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Looking for a tour of the Riot offices? " rel="faq-a-496" class="faq-question">Looking for a tour of the Riot offices? </a>
<div id="faq-a-496" class="faq-answer"> <p>We now offer sneak peeks into our Los Angeles, California headquarters. To learn more, click <a href="http://www.riotgames.com/tours" target="_blank">here</a>.</p>
<p>Can&#39;t make it down to LA, but still want a look? Check out this behind-the-scenes look of our&nbsp;<a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150420/1663/twas-night-our-move-la" target="_blank">new office</a>!</p>
 </div>  </li>
        <!-- <li class="ftr-link"></li> -->
  </ul></div><div class="item-list">      <h3>Press</h3>
    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="In need of press materials? Have a media request? " rel="faq-a-73" class="faq-question">In need of press materials? Have a media request? </a>
<div id="faq-a-73" class="faq-answer"> <p>If you&#39;re with the <strong>media or press </strong>and want to talk, shoot a note to&nbsp;<a href="mailto:media@riotgames.com">the folks in Riot Communications</a>.&nbsp;(If you&#39;re not media or press and you send a note there, we&#39;ll&nbsp;<a href="http://youtu.be/gAYL5H46QnQ" target="_blank">throw it on the ground</a>. Media only, man.)&nbsp;</p>
 </div>  </li>
        <!-- <li class="ftr-link"></li> -->
  </ul></div><div class="item-list">      <h3>League of Legends</h3>
    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Can I use your IP?" rel="faq-a-2357" class="faq-question">Can I use your IP?</a>
<div id="faq-a-2357" class="faq-answer"> <p>Want to create an app, website, t-shirt or something else with our intellectual property, but don&rsquo;t know what&rsquo;s legally kosher? &nbsp;Check out our <a href="http://www.riotgames.com/legal-jibber-jabber">Legal Jibber Jabber</a>. If you&rsquo;re trying to get feedback on an app or website, register it at our <a href="https://developer.riotgames.com/">Developer Portal</a>.</p>
 </div>  </li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Got an awesome idea for League of Legends? " rel="faq-a-495" class="faq-question">Got an awesome idea for League of Legends? </a>
<div id="faq-a-495" class="faq-answer"> <p>If you&#39;ve got an awesome idea for a skin, champion or how to improve <em>League of Legends</em>, the best place for these is <a href="http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/" target="_blank">http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/</a>.&nbsp;We do read the forums and pay attention to the ideas that players share with us there.&nbsp;</p>
<p>For a bunch of reasons, we can&#39;t accept submissions for skin or champion concepts, but we&#39;ve noticed that many summoners love coming up with concepts so we created <a href="http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts" target="_blank"><span class="s1">this forum</span></a> where you can post and share these ideas. If you post here, you&#39;ll get others&#39; feedback on your concept.</p>
<p>Please note that this forum&#39;s purpose isn&#39;t to help Riot find the newest champion of the League. Rather, we want to give you a platform to express your creativity.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
 </div>  </li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-3 views-row-odd faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Looking to start a tournament?" rel="faq-a-2358" class="faq-question">Looking to start a tournament?</a>
<div id="faq-a-2358" class="faq-answer"> If you&#39;re setting up a tournament and looking for support, check out our <a href="http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/community/prized-events" target="_blank">Prized Events page</a> where you&rsquo;ll be able to submit an application. If you can&rsquo;t find your answer there, hit up <a href="mailto:tournaments@riotgames.com">tournaments@riotgames.com</a>.
 </div>  </li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-4 views-row-even views-row-last faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Need help putting League of Legends videos on the YouTubes?" rel="faq-a-493" class="faq-question">Need help putting League of Legends videos on the YouTubes?</a>
<div id="faq-a-493" class="faq-answer"> <p>If you&#39;d like to put your&nbsp;<em>League of Legends</em>&nbsp;fan videos on YouTube or another streaming video distributor, but need to cut through the proverbial red tape, check out the official policy on advertising in your&nbsp;<em>League of Legends</em>&nbsp;videos&nbsp;<a href="/legal-jibber-jabber" target="_blank">here</a>.&nbsp;</p>
 </div>  </li>
        <!-- <li class="ftr-link"></li> -->
  </ul></div><div class="item-list">      <h3>Player Support &amp; Billing</h3>
    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Have a billing issue or experiencing a problem with League of Legends?" rel="faq-a-75" class="faq-question">Have a billing issue or experiencing a problem with League of Legends?</a>
<div id="faq-a-75" class="faq-answer"> <p>Please submit a ticket at <a href="http://support.leagueoflegends.com" target="_blank">support.leagueoflegends.com</a>. This is the <strong>fastest</strong> way to get your issue resolved. We apologize for your difficulties and want to make things right. Taking your <em>League of Legends</em> support issues directly to the <em>League of Legends</em> support team is the best way to get speedy resolution.&nbsp;Support questions or tickets submitted to <em>League of Legends</em> or Riot Games email addresses will end up being re-directed back to the <a href="http://support.leagueoflegends.com" target="_blank"><em>League of Legends</em> support site.</a></p>
 </div>  </li>
        <!-- <li class="ftr-link"></li> -->
  </ul></div><div class="item-list">      <h3>Misc</h3>
    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Need some new threads or a fluffy friend?" rel="faq-a-2359" class="faq-question">Need some new threads or a fluffy friend?</a>
<div id="faq-a-2359" class="faq-answer"> <p>You&rsquo;re in luck! We recently launched our <a href="https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/" target="_blank">official merch site</a> with collectibles and clothing we hope you&rsquo;ll love.</p>
 </div>  </li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even views-row-last faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Question about privacy, your personal information, or data? " rel="faq-a-2356" class="faq-question">Question about privacy, your personal information, or data? </a>
<div id="faq-a-2356" class="faq-answer"> <p>We&#39;ve got an address just for that - <a href="mailto:privacy@riotgames.com">privacy@riotgames.com</a> is the place to go.</p>
 </div>  </li>
        <!-- <li class="ftr-link"></li> -->
  </ul></div>    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div>    </div>
  </div>
</div>      </div>
</div>  </div>
</div></section>

</section><section class="block block-menu block-menu-footer-menu-3 block-menu-menu-footer-menu-3 odd" id="block-menu-menu-footer-menu-3">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
              <h2 class="block-title">Games</h2>
            
    <div class="content clearfix">
      <ul class="menu"><li class="first last leaf"><a href="/our-games">League of Legends</a></li>
</ul>    </div>
  </div>
</section>  </div>

  <!-- Page -->
  
  <div class="page animsition">
    <div class="page-content padding-30-main container-fluid">
      

<div class="row">
	<div class="col-md-10 panel-content">
		<div class="body container" style="height:100%">
                

                

                
                

                
<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:20px;">
    <div class="span12">
        <br>
        <center><h4 style="color: #777;">Submit a piece of software that utilizes Champion Mastery data<br>which excels primarily in one of the following categories:</h4></center>
        <br><br>
        <table width="100%">
            <tbody><tr>
                <td id="menu-entertainment" width="33%" align="center" class="menu-selected"><h5>Entertainment</h5></td>
                <td id="menu-usability" width="33%" align="center" class="menu"><h5>Usability/Practicality</h5></td>
                <td id="menu-creativity" width="33%" align="center" class="menu"><h5>Creativity/Originality</h5></td>
            </tr>
        </tbody></table>
    </div>
    <div id="entertainment" class="span12">
        <br><br>
        <h2>First Place</h2>
        <div style="display: inline-block; width: 100%">
            <div>
                <img src="https://s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/riot-api/api-challenge/2016/masteryduel.png" align="right" style="width: 285px; margin-left: 10px;">
                <h4 style="margin-bottom: 0;"><a href="https://github.com/sleepysort/masteryduel" target="_blank" style="text-decoration: none;">Mastery Duel</a> <span style="color: #555; font-size: 21px;"><b>By SleepyBox (NA) and Bouhm (NA)</b></span></h4>
                We saw several games built around Champion Mastery each with its own merits, but our favorite was Mastery Duel. Utilizing Champion Mastery, this card game allows players to experience their favorite champions in an entirely new experience that made the game feel way more personalized than we’ve seen in the past. The combination of the scope of the project, the game play, and integration of Champion Mastery that lead us to choose Mastery Duel as the winner in the entertainment category.
            </div>
        </div>
        <br><br>
        <br><br>
        <h3>Entertainment Entries</h3>
        <a href="https://github.com/MiniguyBrendan/1v1Predict" target="_blank">1v1 Predictor</a> by Miniguy (NA) and conorrman (NA)<br>
        <a href="https://github.com/nnorbert/battleoflegends" target="_blank">Battle of Legends</a> by Tantes11 (EUNE) and BadN3w5 (EUNE)<br>
        <a href="https://github.com/un0btanium/ChampionChallenge" target="_blank">Champion Challenge</a> by unobtanium (EUW)<br>
        <a href="https://github.com/DanielBGomez/Champion-Master-Finder" target="_blank">Champion Master Finder</a> by DanielGomez (LAN) and ScraguiGamer (LAN)<br>
        <a href="https://github.com/DanielBGomez/Champion-Master" target="_blank">Champion Master Trivia</a> by DanielGomez (LAN) and ScraguiGamer (LAN)<br>
        <a href="https://github.com/AnHonestThief/LeagueChampionMastery" target="_blank">Champion Mastery Lookup</a> by An Honest Thief (EUW)<br>
        <a href="https://github.com/dfkuro/Champion-Mastery-Tracker" target="_blank">Champion Mastery Tracker</a> by Dfkuro (LAN)<br>
        <a href="https://github.com/jdubuisson/ChampMasteryBrawl" target="_blank">ChampMastery : Brawl</a> by Jagarmot (EUW)<br>
        <a href="https://github.com/yaoyunchen/MLG_App" target="_blank">cMLG App</a> by cowsgomur (NA) and Zelthrox (NA)<br>
        <a href="https://github.com/DanielBGomez/Destroy-The-Nexus" target="_blank">Destroy the Nexus</a> by DanielGomez (LAN) and ScraguiGamer (LAN)<br>
        <a href="https://github.com/zgorawski/FindMyMain" target="_blank">FindMyMain</a> by ethylparaben (EUNE) and vinidrea (EUNE)<br>
